bug.author: tholor
bug.summary: Tutorials don't reflect latest changes in DB layer
bug.description: The tutorial / example has not been updated yet after the latest changes introduced by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/pull/10>#10</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tanaysoni>@tanaysoni</denchmark-link> : I know there will be more changes regarding elasticsearch integration, but can you please update them in a minimalistic way to keep them working :)
